title: Eddie Hearn Says Devin Haney Has Been ‘Poisoned by the Money,’ No Longer Chasing Legacy or Greatness

Eddie Hearn Says Devin Haney Has Been ‘Poisoned by the Money,’ No Longer Chasing Legacy or Greatness @ Boxing News 24
content: Devin Haney is a fighter that promoter Eddie Hearn views as no longer “chasing legacy” like he was earlier in his 10-year career.  Hearn says Haney (32-0, 16 KOs) has become poisoned “by the money.” … [+3179 chars]
